title: Bug 17423: Revert appears twice in the popup menu.
description: There are two Revert options in the menu.
OB: When the user opens the popup menu, there are two instances of the Revert option displayed.
EB: There should be only one Revert option in the popup menu, and it should be disabled as expected.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1) Open the software.
2) Make changes to the editor to make it dirty.
3) Open the popup menu.
